name: DOTNUKE
description:
A zen-like, experimental art game.

WAR: How quickly can you 'detonate'?
PEACE: How long can you survive before 'detonation'?

Relax and enjoy.

$1 or more

You get DOTNUKE for PC!

Move and adjust the arc of your DOTNUKE with your keyboard, mouse, or game controller.

Patreon

DOTNUKE is included in the Apps Pass, a collection of games for my Patrons, including some Patreon exclusives.

Thank you for your support!
